mapper.select: select fkind1, fkind2, fkind3, fuseyn, fvalue, fdoc, fsidx, fregdt , DATE_FORMAT(fregdt,'%Y-%m-%d') AS fregdt2 from tcommcd where 1=1 and fkind1 = #{fkind1} and fkind2 = #{fkind2} order by fkind3 asc

SELECT fevttm /*[BasicInfo.sysLogList]*/ , ts.fsiteid , s.fname , u.funm , left(ts.fsyscode,2) AS syslogdept1 , (SELECT fvalue FROM tcommcd WHERE fkind1 = 'code' AND fkind2 = 'accsyslogdept1' AND fkind3 = left(ts.fsyscode,2)) AS syslogdeptnm1 , left(ts.fsyscode,4) AS syslogdept2 , (SELECT fvalue FROM tcommcd WHERE fkind1 = 'code' AND fkind2 = 'accsyslogdept2' AND fkind3 = left(ts.fsyscode,4)) AS syslogdeptnm2 , left(ts.fsyscode,6) AS syslogdept3 , (SELECT fvalue FROM tcommcd WHERE fkind1 = 'code' AND fkind2 = 'accsyslogdept3' AND fkind3 = left(ts.fsyscode,6)) AS syslogdeptnm3 , fsyscode , (SELECT fvalue FROM tcommcd WHERE fkind1 = 'code' AND fkind2 = 'accsyslogdept4' AND fkind3 = ts.fsyscode) AS fsyscodenm , fdetail , fcnntip from tsyslog ts left outer join tsiteuser s on s.fsiteid = ts.fsiteid left outer join tuserinfo_main u on u.fpartcd1 = s.site_id and u.fuid = s.fuid where 1=1
order by fevttm desc limit #{srchCnt} offset #{offset}
select count(*) cnt from tsyslog ts where 1=1

select ${chkValueArray} from ( SELECT fevttm , ts.fsiteid , s.fname , u.funm , left(ts.fsyscode,2) AS syslogdept1 , (SELECT fvalue FROM tcommcd WHERE fkind1 = 'code' AND fkind2 = 'accsyslogdept1' AND fkind3 = left(ts.fsyscode,2)) AS syslogdeptnm1 , left(ts.fsyscode,4) AS syslogdept2 , (SELECT fvalue FROM tcommcd WHERE fkind1 = 'code' AND fkind2 = 'accsyslogdept2' AND fkind3 = left(ts.fsyscode,4)) AS syslogdeptnm2 , left(ts.fsyscode,6) AS syslogdept3 , (SELECT fvalue FROM tcommcd WHERE fkind1 = 'code' AND fkind2 = 'accsyslogdept3' AND fkind3 = left(ts.fsyscode,6)) AS syslogdeptnm3 , fsyscode , (SELECT fvalue FROM tcommcd WHERE fkind1 = 'code' AND fkind2 = 'accsyslogdept4' AND fkind3 = ts.fsyscode) AS fsyscodenm , fdetail , fcnntip from tsyslog ts left outer join tsiteuser s on s.fsiteid = ts.fsiteid left outer join tuserinfo_main u on u.fpartcd1 = s.site_id and u.fuid = s.fuid where 1=1
) uu order by fevttm desc

select author_nm as authorNm , author_desc as authorDesc , regist_dt as registDt , modify_dt as modifyDt , use_yn as useYn , author_id as authorId , sort_ordr as sortOrdr from author_tb order by sort_ordr
mapper.insert: insert into author_tb (author_id,author_nm,use_yn,sort_ordr,regist_dt,modify_dt,author_desc) select LPAD(nvl(max(author_id), 0) + 1, 5, '0') , #{authorNm} , 'Y' , case when #{sortOrdr} is null or #{sortOrdr} = '' then nvl(max(sort_ordr), 0)+1 else #{sortOrdr} end , now(3) , now(3) , #{authorDesc} from AUTHOR_TB
mapper.select: select site_id as siteId, site_nm as siteNm, sort_ordr as sortOrdr, use_yn as useYn, regist_id as registId, regist_dt as registDt, modify_dt as modifyDt, site_desc as siteDesc from site_tb order by sort_ordr asc
mapper.insert: insert into site_tb (site_id,site_nm,use_yn,sort_ordr,regist_id, regist_dt,modify_dt,site_desc) values ((select LPAD(COUNT(*)+1,3,'0') from SITE_TB id),#{siteNm},'Y',#{sortOrdr},#{registId}, NOW(3),NOW(3),#{siteDesc})
